title: Inclusive Leadership
content: Working in a diverse team has its own challenges, it is not enough to just hire diverse teams. Leaders need to foster the inclusive environments for the individuals to thrive. What kind of leader are you and what kind of leader do you want to be?

title: Data Leadership
content: Data is still a new field and most often a person in a data leadership position is desired to have experience in data. Growing in ones data career took time and effort. Going up the career ladder requires more and more leadership skills. What does it mean to be an impactful data leader?
